Subject: Re: At our allies base
From: Robert Dahl <rdahl@...>

Before Astroblast can take off Motormaster can be seen straining to sit up
and look at his allies of battle, "We , Cough, will keep in touch" and then
strains very hardly to stand up, his left arm falling off at the wound. His
knee buckles under the tear, and he is leaking oil all over his damaged
body. He extends his hand towards Killfest.
